channel.title: Comments on: Obtain a logical dump of Signal data on Android with signal-back

item.title: By: Mike Williamson
item.dc:creator: Mike Williamson
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2019/05/15/obtain-logical-signal-android/#comment-362">Retired Hacker</a>.
You are correct! Good news though if you have access AXIOM, we are able to decrypt the backups directly now.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Retired Hacker.

You are correct! Good news though if you have access AXIOM, we are able to decrypt the backups directly now.

item.title: By: Retired Hacker
item.dc:creator: Retired Hacker
item.description: It no longer works, and the development seems to be abandoned on it as there are no activity
item.content:encoded: It no longer works, and the development seems to be abandoned on it as there are no activity

item.title: By: D Kraan
item.dc:creator: D Kraan
item.description: Nice walkthrough Mike. Will likely come in handy at some point
item.content:encoded: Nice walkthrough Mike. Will likely come in handy at some point
